card.title: Activate or deactivate the plugin for certain sales channels

input-field.name: altShippingAddressActive
input-field.label: Enable change of delivery address via an additional form.
Änderung der Lieferadresse über ein zusätzliches Formular ermöglichen.

input-field.name: altShippingAddressChangeName
input-field.label: Enable change of recipient name as well.
Änderung des Empfänger-Namen ebenfalls ermöglichen.

input-field.name: altShippingAddressDisableAddressChangeButtons
input-field.label: Disable buttons in checkout to change addresses.
Buttons zum Ändern der Adressen im Checkout deaktivieren.

input-field.name: altShippingAddressCsvAddresses
input-field.label: Addresses as CSV
input-field.helpText: Add addresses as CSV to be used as presets. Order of columns: company;street;zip;city
